title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7033.1 - Policy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7033.1 - Policy

State Regulations

To comply with Correction Law, section 500-b, to afford
appropriate precautions for the personal safety and welfare of persons in
custody, and to foster the safety, security and good order of the local
correctional facility, it is essential that accurate information be available
to corrections administrators. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7033.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
